name: Space Invasion: Galaxy Shooter
description:
Welcome pilot! We are under attack from an invading unidentified alien species! We've lost nearly the entire fleet from this surprise attack.  You need to protect your planet with everything you've got! 

Good luck pilot!

Destroy alien ships and get the highest score you can!! Screenshot the scores and post them in the comments! 

Art assets for this game provided by GameDevHQ, Josh Marshall

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD - move ship

SPACE - Shoot

'R' - reload level

'Q' - quit level
